news_header: Flixbus is set to launch bus services in Finland by summer, connecting major cities like Helsinki, Tampere, and Turku.
news_text: Flixbus plans to start operating in Finland by summer, with multiple daily services from Helsinki to Tampere and Turku. The company aims to collaborate with local bus companies to expand routes under the Flixbus brand. Negotiations are ongoing with five Finnish bus companies, and the goal is to have two or three partners by summer. Additionally, Flixbus is considering long-distance night bus services based on demand. The company began operations in Finland in summer 2023, and due to delays in acquiring new buses, it will transfer buses from Central Europe to meet demand.
